name: transport, freight, train with reefer, cooling | transport, freight, train with reefer, cooling | Cutoff, U
description:
ecoQuery: https://ecoquery.ecoinvent.org/3.10/cutoff/dataset/13812/documentation

This dataset represent transport of reefer (refrigerated container) on a freight train. The operation mode of the reefer is cooling (temperature between 0째C and 20째C).;The amount of operation of the reefer needed is calculated using the assumption of the average speed of the train.;Reefer being transported by a train, Switzerland, Z체rich, Hardbr체cke train station, December 2014

This dataset simply combine two other activities - transport, freight train and operation of reefer, For more information on these two activities please see the datasets representing these two activities.
